::: landing-text
**fishR** provides resources for fisheries-related analyses performed in [R](https://www.r-project.org/about.html), an environment for statistical analyses and graphics that has gained wide popularity with fisheries scientists. We hope the resources in the navigation bar above will help you use or expand your knowledge of R for fisheries-related analyses.
:::
